data.title: Every selection in the 2015 NHL draft
data.meta_description: Every selection in the 2015 NHL Draft.
data.text:
Every selection in the 2015 NHL Draft.

The 2015 NHL Draft has concluded and the next wave of stars have officially found their new homes. This year's draft class was stacked with prospects that have the potential to become franchise cornerstones in the near future. Here is every selection in this years NHL Draft.

ROUND 1

Edmonton: Connor McDavid, C, Erie Otters

Buffalo: Jack Eichel, C, Boston University

Arizona: Dylan Strome, C, Erie Otters

Toronto: Mitch Marner, C, London Knights

Carolina: Noah Hanifin, D, Boston College
